answers.answer: Hi, I run an HCG Diet Program out of Fayetteville, AR, and we ship the program to you. We also offer weekly e-check ins with you throughout the Program. It is normally $299.00 + $10 for s&h, but until 06/01/10 it is only $200.00 + $10 for s&h.You can call my office @ 479-442-0676. Ask for Allison. If for some reason I am out of the office, leave a message and I will get right back to you.

I live in Fayetteville AR. My primary care provider will not give me a letter of neccessity to get bariatric surgery although I weigh 260 pounds have borderline diabetes and high blood pressure and sleep apnea.  Do you know of a local doctor that will give me a letter of neccessity?

question: I live in Corning, Arkansas, about 2 1/2 hours from Memphis, TN, 3-4 hours from Little Rock, AR and 4 hours from St. Louis, MO and want to know where I can go to get the b12/hcg shots?  I've called around to some doctors in Jonesboro, AR and Poplar Bluff, MO, but can't find anyone that does it.  Please help if you can!  I would be willing to give myself the shots if I can find a dr that isn't too far away that would let me.  I would be willing to go the 4 hour or so trip if it isn't too often.
title: b12/hcg shots around Arkansas?
